title: 超常事件6282
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:pride-highlighter |inc-lgbt-alt= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:author-label-source start=--
|name=LightlessLantern & Rye Travis
|no-right-margin=*]]
**超常事件6282：**调查进行中
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:author-label-source end=--]]

**初步命名：**EE-6282

**分级状态：**Pending

[[include component:image-block name=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-6282/OutpostLocation.jpg|caption=图像14]]

**前期事件：**2023/04/25，基金会Site-26收到了来自监测前哨站51-ث的求救信息，并对前哨站‎数据库进行了紧急备份。随后试图联络前哨站51-ث‎，但没有成功，特工被派出以协助驻扎人员。到达后，没有前哨站存在的迹象；只有一片被树环绕的空地（见图像06至17）。多个物体被回收并转移至Site-26以供分析。

**回收物品记录：**

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |cell-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |cell-start= --] |cell-header= 物品上的字迹 ]]
”Benyamin Ashraf的财产”
[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |cell-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |cell-start= --] |cell-header= 其他细节 ]]
物品在解剖过程中被发现嵌入于人脑中。最后一个音频文件在前哨站51-ث‎发送求救信息前10分钟内开始录制，包含了Ashraf在附近森林消失后对一发现的密封木盒的分析。Ashraf首先注意到一个描述错误，即在打开盒子前其上没有字迹，随后音频质量失真。Ashraf在其中发现了一个更小的盒子，将其拿出后打开，伴随着音频质量的进一步失真。这一过程重复了三次，有五个体积更小的盒子，递归地依次包含。此时，音频质量已严重失真，有时无法辨认。文件在Ashraf成功打开第五个盒子时结束。
[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |cell-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |row-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |row-start= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |cell-start= --] |cell-header= 物品编号 ]]
物品6
[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |cell-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |cell-start= --] |cell-header= 描述 ]]
高1.0米的立方体盒子，由混凝土、钢和人类血肉制成
[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |cell-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |cell-start= --] |cell-header= 物品上的字迹 ]]
起先无字迹，回收后在未知时间出现了“Site-26”
[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |cell-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |cell-start= --] |cell-header= 其他细节 ]]
物品被密封，并不定期发出严重失真的监测前哨站51-ث求救信息。严禁打开物品6。
[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |cell-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |row-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:responsive-tables-source |responsive-table-end= --] ]]
